column4: I recently bought a toshiba a505 s-6005. it has a core i3 processor, and integrated intel graphics media accelerator 4500hd, 4gb ddr3 ram. When I try to install ubuntu from live cd it shows me a black screen, like it was running but not showing video
I tried ubuntu 9.10 32 and 64 bits , and ubuntu 9.04 32bits. Any idas? What it is?
I searched a lot but couldn't find anything concrete about this issue I got when installing ubuntu from live cd
have you tried to right-click on the desktop and get the settings menu up?
